Supports Intel XMP 2.0 profiles for simple one-click performance boosting. A reliable and stylish upgrade for mid to high-end gaming rigs.

name: Thermalright Frost Commander 140 CPU Cooler
title: Thermalright Frost Commander 140 CPU Cooler
description: The Thermalright Frost Commander 140 is an elite dual-tower CPU air cooler designed for extreme overclocking and high-end systems. It comes with one 140mm and one 120mm PWM fan in a push-pull configuration, ensuring unmatched airflow and static pressure. Equipped with five 8mm heatpipes and a full nickel-plated copper base, it delivers superior heat transfer and stability. Supporting TDPs up to 300W, it’s ideal for Intel i9 and Ryzen 9 processors. Its precision-machined fins and optimized air channeling provide maximum cooling with minimum noise. Despite its immense power, it operates quietly thanks to fluid dynamic bearings. Built for performance enthusiasts and professionals demanding reliability and power under heavy loads.

name: Thermalright Peerless Assassin 120 SE White ARGB CPU Cooler
title: Thermalright Peerless Assassin 120 SE White ARGB CPU Cooler
description: The Thermalright Peerless Assassin 120 SE White ARGB is a stunning blend of aesthetics and cooling power. Its dual-tower design with six 6mm heatpipes provides outstanding thermal performance up to 265W TDP. The dual 120mm ARGB fans ensure balanced cooling and dazzling visuals, all synchronized with major RGB control software. The all-white aesthetic complements clean builds, while its 157mm height ensures compatibility with most ATX cases. The nickel-plated copper base maximizes CPU contact and heat dissipation efficiency. Perfect for white-themed gaming rigs and content creation systems demanding reliability, silence, and style.

name: Thermalright TL-B12 EXTREME 120mm High-Performance Fan
title: Thermalright TL-B12 EXTREME 120mm High-Performance Fan
description: The Thermalright TL-B12 EXTREME is a high-performance 120mm fan engineered for radiators and heavy-duty air cooling. With speeds up to 2150RPM and airflow up to 72CFM, it ensures efficient heat removal under intense loads. The fluid dynamic bearing system reduces noise and extends lifespan. Anti-vibration rubber pads enhance stability and reduce resonance. Ideal for CPU coolers, radiators, and chassis airflow optimization. Its black industrial design ensures durability and professional aesthetics. Perfect for enthusiasts seeking both silence and unmatched cooling capability in performance builds.

name: XPG SX8200 Pro 1TB PCIe Gen3 NVMe SSD
title: XPG SX8200 Pro 1TB PCIe Gen3 NVMe SSD
description: The XPG SX8200 Pro 1TB SSD remains one of the best PCIe Gen3 NVMe drives for balanced performance and affordability. With sequential read/write speeds up to 3500MB/s and 3000MB/s respectively, it provides fast system responsiveness and smooth multitasking. The slim M.2 2280 form factor ensures compatibility with desktops and laptops. It includes an optional heatsink for additional cooling flexibility. NVMe 1.3 and LDPC error correction enhance stability and longevity. Ideal for gamers, professionals, and upgraders seeking a reliable high-speed SSD with proven endurance.

name: Thermalright Contact Frame for Intel LGA1700 Socket
title: Thermalright Contact Frame for Intel LGA1700 Socket
description: The Thermalright LGA1700 Contact Frame improves CPU cooler contact and prevents bending on Intel’s LGA1700 socket. Made from high-quality CNC-machined aluminum, it replaces the stock ILM bracket for more even pressure distribution. This ensures better thermal performance and reduces the risk of uneven paste application. Easy to install and compatible with most air and liquid coolers. It’s an essential accessory for builders using 12th–14th Gen Intel CPUs who seek optimized thermal transfer, stability, and long-term reliability. A must-have upgrade for overclockers and enthusiasts demanding maximum efficiency.

name: Thermalright Peerless Assassin 120 SE ARGB CPU Cooler
title: Thermalright Peerless Assassin 120 SE ARGB CPU Cooler
description: The Peerless Assassin 120 SE ARGB is a high-efficiency dual-tower air cooler featuring six 6mm nickel-plated heatpipes and dual 120mm ARGB PWM fans. Designed to deliver strong cooling for mainstream and high-end CPUs while keeping noise low. The precision nickel-plated copper base ensures fast heat transfer and uniform distribution across the fin stacks. ARGB lighting supports motherboard sync for customizable effects. Compact enough to fit many mid-tower cases yet powerful enough for intensive gaming and productivity workloads.

name: Thermalright Assassin X 120 Refined SE CPU Cooler
title: Thermalright Assassin X 120 Refined SE CPU Cooler
description: The Assassin X 120 Refined SE is a balanced single-tower cooler engineered for quiet performance and strong thermal capacity. With four 6mm heatpipes and a precision-milled copper base, it quickly moves heat into a dense fin array. The included high-static-pressure 120mm PWM fan maintains excellent airflow while keeping acoustic levels low. It fits most mid-tower cases (148mm height) and supports both Intel and AMD modern sockets. Ideal for small form-factor builds or users who want high cooling without a large dual-tower footprint.

name: Thermalright Frost Spirit 140 V3 High Performance Cooler
title: Thermalright Frost Spirit 140 V3 High Performance Cooler
description: The Frost Spirit 140 V3 is an elite dual-tower cooler with a 140mm intake fan and a 120mm exhaust fan to maximize airflow and static pressure. Seven 6mm nickel-plated heatpipes and a wide fin stack offer superior dissipation for heavily overclocked CPUs. The cooler is designed for low noise operation while sustaining strong thermal performance, supporting high-TDP processors. Installation hardware includes multi-socket brackets and premium thermal paste. A refined finish and sturdy build make it an excellent choice for enthusiasts seeking top-tier air cooling.

name: Thermalright Frost Commander 140 Black CPU Cooler
title: Thermalright Frost Commander 140 Black CPU Cooler

Five 6mm heatpipes with a nickel-plated copper base ensure rapid heat extraction; the blacked-out finish provides a clean aesthetic for modern builds. It supports high TDP processors and includes easy-mount brackets for Intel and AMD platforms. Engineered for quiet performance and rugged longevity, the Commander is suited for both gaming rigs and workstations.

name: Thermalright Phantom Spirit 120 SE CPU Cooler
title: Thermalright Phantom Spirit 120 SE CPU Cooler

Its nickel-plated copper base and broad fin stack provide consistent thermal transfer under extreme workloads. Designed for silent operation, the included fans use fluid dynamic bearings and tuned blade geometry to balance airflow and RPM. The Phantom Spirit is compatible with modern sockets and fits most mid-tower cases while supporting heavy multitasking and moderate overclocking.

It supports DDR4 memory, has dependable VRMs for mild overclocking, and includes onboard Wi-Fi for convenience. Dual M.2 slots with thermal guards keep NVMe drives cool during heavy transfers. The board offers user-friendly BIOS and adequate I/O for most gamers and creators building a compact workstation.

name: Thermalright Frost Magic 240 V2 ARGB

It's an excellent choice for mid- to high-range gaming PCs and content creation systems that need stable thermals under load. The kit comes with mounting hardware for modern Intel and AMD sockets and offers easy cable routing for clean builds.

name: XPG SPECTRIX D80 DDR5 32GB (2x16GB) 6000MHz

It offers fast frequencies and improved bandwidth for gaming, streaming and creative apps that are memory-sensitive. The modules include attractive RGB lighting and robust heatspreaders for stable operation during sustained loads. XMP/EXPO profiles allow simple setup in most motherboards. name: XPG SPECTRIX D50 DDR4 32GB (2x16GB) 3600MHz

description: A650GF is a reliable 650W 80 PLUS Gold power supply with semi-modular cables for clean builds. It meets the needs of mid-range gaming PCs and productivity systems while delivering efficient power conversion. Protections include OVP, OCP, SCP and OTP, and a quiet fan keeps acoustics low. The unit is ATX-compliant and suitable for modern GPU and CPU combinations.

name: Thermalright WindStopper 360 Magnetic Filter
title: Thermalright WindStopper 360 Magnetic Filter
description: Magnetic WindStopper filter for 360mm front or top intake—helps keep dust out and is easy to remove for cleaning. Fine mesh construction maintains airflow while trapping dust particles. Recommended for users who run systems in dusty environments or who want to reduce maintenance intervals. Simple magnetic attachment makes installation quick.

name: XPG GAMMIX S70 Blade 4TB Heatsinked
title: XPG GAMMIX S70 Blade 4TB (Heatsinked)
description: A high-capacity Gen4 NVMe ideal for professional workstations that need fast local storage. The heatsinked S70 Blade keeps sustained throughput strong for long transfers and reduces throttling during heavy workloads. This model is suited for video editing scratch disks, large game libraries and multi-project environments. Built with reliable controllers and ECC features to maintain data integrity under stress.

name: MSI MPG Z790 EDGE WIFI DDR5 (Compact)
title: MSI MPG Z790 EDGE WIFI DDR5
description: MPG Z790 EDGE WiFi combines performance features and a relatively compact ATX layout for builders who demand strong connectivity and DDR5 memory support. Strong VRM design and comprehensive thermals support higher-core-count CPUs. It's a popular choice for gaming rigs and mid-high tier workstations that need both tuning capability and integrated Wi-Fi.

name: Thermalright TL-Mini M.2 Heatsink Duo (Set)
title: Thermalright TL-Mini M.2 Heatsink Duo (Set)
description: Two-piece set of low-profile M.2 heatsinks ideal for systems with limited clearance. These heatsinks help keep NVMe drives cooler and preserve peak transfer speeds across long workloads. The adhesive pads and slim profile make them compatible with most motherboards and laptop upgrade scenarios. A quick, inexpensive performance safeguard for modern systems.

name: XPG SPECTRIX D60G PRO 32GB (2x16GB) DDR4 3600MHz
title: XPG SPECTRIX D60G PRO 32GB (2x16GB) DDR4 3600MHz
description: D60G PRO is an RGB-accented DDR4 kit offering strong frequency and timing for gamers still on DDR4 platforms. The kit balances thermal performance through robust heatspreaders and stable ICs tested for reliability. XMP compatibility makes it easy to enable the advertised speeds on supported boards. Perfect for high-performance DDR4-based gaming PCs.

name: MSI MPG GUNGNIR 110R (Tempered Glass Black)
title: MSI MPG GUNGNIR 110R
description: MPG GUNGNIR 110R is a stylish mid-tower case with tempered glass and preinstalled ARGB fans for attractive presentation out of the box. Its airflow-oriented front and top panels support multiple radiators. Cable routing options and PSU shroud simplify clean cable management. Ideal for builders who want a balanced showpiece and cooling performance.

name: Thermalright CL-White 5g Thermal Paste
title: Thermalright CL-White 5g Thermal Paste
description: CL-White 5g is a non-conductive thermal compound offering very good thermal conductivity and easy application. Suitable for both CPU and GPU reapplications, it provides reliable thermal transfer and long-term stability. The syringe format is convenient for multiple applications. A cost-effective, high-performance paste for routine maintenance or new builds.

name: XPG SX8100 4TB NVMe
title: XPG SX8100 4TB NVMe
description: SX8100 4TB is a high-capacity Gen3 NVMe solution for users who need significant local storage without Gen4. The drive provides solid sustained performance and endurance suitable for large media libraries and archives. Heatsinkless design fits into most motherboards and laptops with available M.2 slots. Great for archiving projects and large-scale game collections where capacity is primary.

name: MSI PRO B460M-A (Legacy Support)
title: MSI PRO B460M-A
description: PRO B460M-A is an affordable micro-ATX option targeting older Intel CPU platforms. It provides stable daily performance, SATA and M.2 storage, and essential connectivity for office and light gaming machines. Useful for repair shops and value-focused builders maintaining older systems. Durable construction and intuitive BIOS utilities ease maintenance tasks.

name: Thermalright TL-Flow 140 ARGB (Single)
title: Thermalright TL-Flow 140 ARGB (Single)
description: TL-Flow 140 ARGB is a high-airflow 140mm fan with addressable lighting—optimised for chassis intake or radiator use. Broad blade design moves significant air while keeping noise controlled. The ARGB implementation syncs with motherboard headers for unified lighting control. Recommended when airflow and aesthetics are both priorities.

name: XPG GAMMIX D30 1TB SATA
title: XPG GAMMIX D30 1TB SATA
description: GAMMIX D30 1TB is an affordable SATA SSD that delivers fast boot times and improved responsiveness over mechanical drives. It is robust enough for everyday desktop and laptop use and features energy-efficient operation for portable systems. The 2.5-inch form factor ensures broad compatibility. Ideal for budget-conscious users needing reliable storage upgrades.

name: MSI PRO B550-A PRO AM4
title: MSI PRO B550-A PRO
description: PRO B550-A Pro provides a solid AM4 platform with PCIe Gen4 support on the primary slot and M.2. It's aimed at users who want reliability and upgrade paths for Ryzen-based systems. Robust thermal solutions and an easy-to-navigate BIOS help maintain stability under everyday or light workstation loads. Suitable for builders who prefer a stable AM4 ecosystem.

name: Thermalright NanoPad 10-Pack (Assorted)
title: Thermalright NanoPad 10-Pack (Assorted)
description: A 10-pack of assorted thickness NanoPads for VRM, SSD and component gap filling. Non-conductive pads with good thermal conductivity help clean installations and repairs. Useful for system integrators and technicians who frequently service motherboards and GPUs. The assortment covers common gap sizes for flexible use.

name: XPG GAMMIX S55 Blade 1TB Heatsinked
title: XPG GAMMIX S55 Blade 1TB (Heatsinked)
description: GAMMIX S55 Blade 1TB brings Gen4 speeds in a thermally-managed package for compact and high-performance builds. The included low-profile heatsink helps sustain peak performance during longer transfers. Good as a primary drive for gaming and creative workflows requiring fast scratch disks. LDPC ECC and SLC caching improve reliability and consistent throughput.

name: MSI PRO H310M-E R2.0 (Legacy DDR4)
title: MSI PRO H310M-E R2.0
description: A simple, value-oriented H310 micro-ATX board for older Intel generations. Provides reliable basics like SATA ports, M.2 support (varies by SKU), and essential I/O for office and budget systems. Popular for refurbishments, repairs, or very low-cost builds where new platform features are not required. Durable and easy to maintain.

name: Thermalright QuickMount Socket Kit (AM4/AM5/LGA1700)
title: Thermalright QuickMount Socket Kit (AM4/AM5/LGA1700)
description: A universal QuickMount kit compatible with AM4, AM5 and LGA1700 sockets, useful for switching coolers between systems or replacing lost hardware. Includes brackets, screws and backplates for secure, reliable mounting. Ideal for technicians and frequent upgraders who need cross-platform compatibility. Saves time during builds and service.

name: XPG SPECTRIX D80 DDR5 16GB (2x8GB) 5200MHz
title: XPG SPECTRIX D80 DDR5 16GB (2x8GB) 5200MHz
description: Compact DDR5 kit offering improved bandwidth and future-proofing for newer platforms. Ideal for entry-to-mid-level builds that want DDR5 benefits without premium frequency pricing. Robust heatspreaders and RGB options make it suitable for mainstream gaming rigs. Quick XMP/EXPO profiles offer easy setup.

name: MSI MPG Z690 EDGE WIFI DDR4 (Special Edition)
title: MSI MPG Z690 EDGE WIFI DDR4
description: Z690 EDGE WiFi DDR4 is aimed at users who want to keep DDR4 memory while gaining modern I/O and connectivity. The board balances performance and compatibility with mature firmware, multiple storage options and integrated Wi-Fi. Good for builders who want a stable platform for high-core-count CPUs without the expense of DDR5 upgrades.

name: Thermalright Frost Commander 120 SE
title: Thermalright Frost Commander 120 SE
description: A single-tower cooler optimized for 120mm fans offering a compact alternative to larger dual-tower designs. It provides good thermal performance for mainstream CPUs and remains compatible with most RAM modules due to its narrow profile. Quiet operation and durable construction make it suitable for daily use and moderate overclocking. Easy mounting and included hardware further ease installation.

name: XPG SX8200 Pro 256GB Heatsinked
title: XPG SX8200 Pro 256GB (Heatsinked)
description: SX8200 Pro 256GB with heatsink is an entry-level NVMe drive for fast boot and responsive system performance on a tight budget. The heatsink reduces throttling in compact builds and laptops with limited airflow. A good upgrade for older systems where the added durability and speed of NVMe bring the most noticeable everyday improvements.

name: MSI MPG Z690 TOMAHAWK DDR5 (Performance)
title: MSI MPG Z690 TOMAHAWK DDR5
description: MPG Z690 TOMAHAWK DDR5 targets high-performance builds with robust VRMs and extensive feature sets for gaming and creation. The board supports high-frequency DDR5 modules, multiple M.2 NVMe slots with thermal protection and premium networking. It is a strong platform for overclockers and users who need reliable long-term stability under heavy loads. Good thermal design supports sustained high-power CPUs.

name: Thermalright TL-Flow ARGB 140 (Single)
title: Thermalright TL-Flow ARGB 140 (Single)
description: A single 140mm ARGB fan tuned for high airflow at low RPMs with addressable RGB lighting. Suitable for front intake or radiator uses where larger fan diameter improves airflow and lowers noise. The ARGB is compatible with standard 5V headers and supports synchronization with motherboard software. Built for both cooling and aesthetic upgrades.

name: XPG SPECTRIX D60G DDR4 8GB Single 3000MHz
title: XPG SPECTRIX D60G DDR4 8GB Single Module 3000MHz
description: A single 8GB module from the SPECTRIX D60G series, providing reliable DDR4 performance and RGB lighting for compact or incremental upgrades. Ideal for upgrading single-stick systems or adding to existing kits. Low profile ensures compatibility with large coolers. XMP profiles enable easy configuration for supported boards.

name: MSI A750G 750W Gold (Full-Modular)
title: MSI A750G 750W Gold (Full-Modular)
description: A750G is a fully modular 750W PSU with an 80 PLUS Gold rating, offering strong efficiency for high-power systems. The unit is ATX3.0/PCIe5-ready (where applicable) and includes robust protections to safeguard components. Quiet fan operation and high-quality capacitors improve reliability under sustained loads. Recommended for builders running powerful GPUs and multi-drive systems.

name: Thermalright NanoTherm 5-Pack (Thin)
title: Thermalright NanoTherm 5-Pack (Thin)
description: A pack of five thin NanoTherm thermal pads for fine-gap filling on VRMs and small components. The pads are non-conductive and provide good thermal transfer in a slim profile. Useful for small boards, M.2 areas and delicate installations. Economical for service centers and hobbyists.

name: XPG GAMMIX S70 Blade 8TB PCIe Gen4 NVMe
title: XPG GAMMIX S70 Blade 8TB PCIe Gen4 NVMe
description: An ultra-high-capacity Gen4 NVMe for professional and enterprise-grade workstations. The S70 Blade 8TB provides top-tier sequential and sustained speeds with thermal management to keep performance consistent over long transfers. Excellent for massive video projects, large datasets, and multi-user workstation environments where maximum local performance matters. Engineered with endurance and ECC for data reliability.

name: MSI MAG CORELIQUID C240 (Black)
title: MSI MAG CORELIQUID C240
description: MAG CORELIQUID C240 is a 240mm AIO cooler offering solid thermal performance in a compact package. The rotatable pump head eases radiator orientation and the ARGB fans provide visual flair without excessive noise. Appropriate for mid-range gaming builds and content machines that need dependable cooling for sustained loads. Easy installation and broad socket support simplify setup.

name: Thermalright QuickClamp RGB M.2 (Single)
title: Thermalright QuickClamp RGB M.2 (Single)
description: A decorative QuickClamp for M.2 drives with subtle RGB accents and a thermal pad. It secures the heatsink in place without adhesive and adds visual flair to showcase systems. Perfect for builders who want both function and presentation on display builds. Easy to install and compatible with most M.2 2280 slots.

name: XPG SX8100 8TB NVMe (Enterprise SKU)
title: XPG SX8100 8TB NVMe (Enterprise SKU)
description: SX8100 8TB enterprise SKU is designed for very large local storage needs where Gen3 NVMe reliability and endurance are essential. Suitable for archive servers, local media farms and specialized workstations. The drive focuses on capacity and steady sustained throughput rather than peak Gen4 speeds. Ideal where large on-device storage is required and Gen3 compatibility is sufficient.

name: MSI PRO B760M-A PRO DDR4
title: MSI PRO B760M-A PRO DDR4
description: A professional-minded micro-ATX B760 board that supports DDR4 memory for cost-effective Intel builds. It features reliable VRMs, multiple M.2 slots and a focus on stable long-term operation rather than flashy extras. Good for office computers, development machines and customers who want proven hardware and easy maintenance.

name: Thermalright Frost Prism 120/240 Conversion Kit
title: Thermalright Frost Prism 120/240 Conversion Kit
description: A practical kit that includes brackets and screws to convert single fan or radiator mount configurations for Frost Prism series kits. Useful for owners who upgrade or reconfigure cases and radiators. The kit ensures correct mounting and minimizes vibration while securing components firmly. Handy accessory for system integrators and DIY builders.

name: XPG SPECTRIX D80 DDR5 256GB (8x32GB) 5200MHz (Server Kit)
title: XPG SPECTRIX D80 DDR5 256GB (8x32GB) 5200MHz (Server Kit)
description: A large DDR5 server/workstation kit packing 256GB across eight modules, intended for heavy multitasking, virtual machines and memory-heavy professional applications. Tested for stability and fitted with thermal spreaders to maintain performance under continuous load. This kit is aimed at content studios, developers and VM hosts that need large fast memory pools.

name: MSI PRO 150P 750W Bronze (Basic)
title: MSI PRO 150P 750W Bronze
description: A straightforward 750W power supply with 80 PLUS Bronze efficiency for entry-level to mid-range systems. Non-modular cabling and proven protections keep costs down while delivering reliable power for standard gaming and productivity builds. Good value for system integrators and budget-focused builders.

name: Thermalright Frost Magic 360 (High Performance)
title: Thermalright Frost Magic 360
description: Frost Magic 360 brings a long 360mm radiator and efficient ARGB fans for high thermal headroom in demanding systems. The pump design emphasizes quiet operation while providing consistent liquid flow for effective cooling. Suitable for high-core-count CPUs and overclocked setups requiring steady thermals. Includes mounting hardware for contemporary sockets and user-friendly installation guides.

name: XPG SX8200 Pro 3TB Heatsinked (Gaming)
title: XPG SX8200 Pro 3TB (Heatsinked Gaming)
description: SX8200 Pro 3TB heatsinked version is tailored for gamers and content creators needing high local capacity with steady throughput. The heatsink helps maintain performance during extended sessions like streaming or long export tasks. Durable NAND and proven controllers deliver endurance for extended use. Great as a primary OS/game drive for large installs.

name: MSI MAG Z890 TOMAHAWK WIFI (Ultimate)
title: MSI MAG Z890 TOMAHAWK WIFI
description: MAG Z890 TOMAHAWK WiFi is a top-tier motherboard for the latest Intel platforms with advanced power delivery, comprehensive I/O and premium connectivity. Built for extreme performance, it supports DDR5 memory, PCIe Gen5 devices and features advanced thermal solutions for sustained overclocking. Integrated Wi-Fi (latest standard) and multi-gig LAN provide flexible networking for gaming and pro workloads. Perfect for builders wanting a durable future-proof platform.

name: XPG LANCER RGB DDR5 64GB (2x32GB) 6400MHz
title: XPG LANCER RGB DDR5 64GB (2x32GB) 6400MHz
description: XPG LANCER RGB 64GB kit is built for enthusiasts demanding both aesthetics and raw performance. The 6400MHz speed offers lightning-fast responsiveness ideal for gaming, rendering, and multitasking. The sleek RGB diffusers synchronize with motherboard lighting systems for full customization. Crafted with premium ICs and advanced power management, it ensures both stability and style for high-end builds.

name: MSI MPG VELOX 100R (ARGB Mid Tower)
title: MSI MPG VELOX 100R
description: MSI MPG VELOX 100R delivers aggressive airflow with four pre-installed ARGB fans and tempered glass aesthetics. Designed for builders who want a mix of cooling power and showpiece design. The case supports up to 360mm radiators, vertical GPU mounting, and excellent cable routing options. A perfect choice for gaming rigs seeking both function and flair.

name: Thermalright Peerless Assassin 120 SE (White)
title: Thermalright Peerless Assassin 120 SE (White Edition)
description: Peerless Assassin 120 SE White offers excellent dual-tower cooling at an affordable price. The white finish and optional ARGB fans make it a stylish centerpiece for themed builds. Six heatpipes and dual 120mm fans ensure efficient heat dissipation, rivaling premium coolers in performance while maintaining low noise levels.

name: XPG CORE REACTOR II 850W Platinum (Full Modular)
title: XPG CORE REACTOR II 850W Platinum
description: The XPG CORE REACTOR II 850W Platinum PSU delivers top-tier efficiency and durability. Fully modular cables help achieve a clean build layout, while high-grade Japanese capacitors ensure stability and reliability. It supports ATX 3.0 and PCIe 5.0 standards, making it ideal for next-gen GPUs and CPUs. Silent operation under low load with 0 RPM fan mode.

name: MSI GeForce RTX 4060 VENTUS 2X 8G OC
title: MSI GeForce RTX 4060 VENTUS 2X 8G OC
description: MSI RTX 4060 Ventus 2X OC provides excellent 1080p and 1440p gaming performance with DLSS 3 support. Its dual-fan cooling design ensures quiet efficiency, while the compact form factor fits smaller cases easily. Ideal for mainstream gamers who want the latest NVIDIA features without extreme cost.

name: Thermalright Chill Wave 240 ARGB (White Edition)
title: Thermalright Chill Wave 240 ARGB White
description: Chill Wave 240 ARGB White delivers a blend of cooling efficiency and clean aesthetics for performance PCs. The 240mm radiator paired with dual ARGB fans maintains excellent thermals even under sustained load. The pump is tuned for silent operation and long-term reliability, making it a solid choice for white-themed systems.
